title: Whittier
name: Whittier Greenway Trail
content: The Whittier Greenway Trail stretches along former Union Pacific railroad right-of-way.  It begins at Pioneer Blvd between Orange and Floral Drives, passes through Palm Park, and crosses over Whittier Boulevard on a historic railroad bridge before ending up at Lambert Road and Mills Avenue.  There are exhibits on Whittier history along several points of the route
